sense.name: administrator, one who controls resources
sense.examples: They are replacing the manager of the Miami office. Jane is the manager of three people in my company. John's manager is on vacation. Who is the general manager of this football franchise? They are training her to be the manager of software products.

sense.name: trainer, usually in sports
sense.examples: The heavyweight champion's manager decided to decline that fight. The new manager makes the team practice an hour more each day. I've hired a Brazilian manager to train my racehorse.
